abstract: Downloads models that the system needs for the current configuration.
overview:
## Discussion

This method downloads model assets required for the current configuration in background. You should call this method if [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTSuperResolutionScalerConfiguration/configurationModelStatus] is `VTSuperResolutionScalerConfigurationModelStatusDownloadRequired`. After this method is called, you can query [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTSuperResolutionScalerConfiguration/configurationModelPercentageAvailable] to determine progress of model asset download process. If the download fails, the completion handler is invoked with an `NSError`, and the [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTSuperResolutionScalerConfiguration/configurationModelStatus] goes back to `VTSuperResolutionScalerConfigurationModelStatusDownloadRequired`. If the download succeeds, the completion handler is invoked with `nil` NSError.

# downloadConfigurationModel(completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Downloads models that the system needs for the current configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
func downloadConfigurationModel(completionHandler: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func downloadConfigurationModel() async throws
```

## Discussion

This method downloads model assets required for the current configuration in background. You should call this method if [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTSuperResolutionScalerConfiguration/configurationModelStatus] is `VTSuperResolutionScalerConfigurationModelStatusDownloadRequired`. After this method is called, you can query [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTSuperResolutionScalerConfiguration/configurationModelPercentageAvailable] to determine progress of model asset download process. If the download fails, the completion handler is invoked with an `NSError`, and the [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTSuperResolutionScalerConfiguration/configurationModelStatus] goes back to `VTSuperResolutionScalerConfigurationModelStatusDownloadRequired`. If the download succeeds, the completion handler is invoked with `nil` NSError.
title: downloadConfigurationModel(completionHandler:)
